level.text: The Commission shall interview the Chief Judge of the requesting judge’s court.
The Commission may seek pertinent information by interviews with others conducted by the full Commission, by one or more members, or by a special counsel or others of its staff.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 24 DCR 9391, 9412 (May 5, 1978); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 6032, 6047 (September 14, 1990); and Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9333, 9348 (December 11, 1992); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 108 (January 6, 2006); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 54 DCR 12322 (December 21, 2007).
